customize-ui-kit/index.title: Customize UI Kit
customize-ui-kit/index.description: This guide helps you to enable/disable features present in the UI Kit.

overview/index.title: Overview
overview/index.description: V4 UI kits offer modular design, extended functionality & customization for a tailored chat experience. Check out our new UIKits here.

ui-component/index.title: UI Components
ui-component/index.description: UI Components are building blocks of the UI Kit. UI Components are a set of custom classes specially designed to build a rich chat app. There are different UI Components available in the
